column18: District is subject to "special revitalization programs and tax credits" but does not affect use.
column22: Areas are those areas served by the Town of Fairlee municipal water system. Minimum area of a lot serviced by municipal water supply is 20,000 square feet and is classified as a Class A lot.
column26: All new structures are prohibited in this protection area.
column28: As delineated as an overlay district on the Zoning Map, otherwise qualified Class B lots (served my on-lot water and sewage) may be waived down to 1-acre minimum lot sizes with the transfer of subdivision rights.
